title: Episodes 217-218: The Captains Square Off! & Full-Blast Slow-Slow Onslaught - Never Watched One Piece
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed first-time viewer's reaction to episodes 217-218, describing them as 'absolute riot' with chaotic, good old-fashioned One Piece fun. Notes Luffy's struggle with Foxy's beam attacks.

title: Afro Luffy vs. Foxy!!! | One Piece Reaction | Episodes 217 & 218
author: Rapidmango Reacts
description: Video reaction covering episodes 217 & 218, focusing on the Captain's final combat round between Afro Luffy and Foxy in the Davy Back Fight.

title: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers
description: Comprehensive review and recap of the entire Long Ring Long Land arc, including detailed analysis of the Davy Back Fight games and the Luffy vs Foxy combat round.

title: One Piece: 5 Reasons Fans Hate The Long Ring Long Land Arc (& 5 Why It's Actually Great)
author: CBR Staff
description: Article analyzing both sides of fan reception to the Long Ring Long Land arc, discussing why it's controversial and defending its merits. Includes discussion of the Luffy vs Foxy fight.

title: One Piece: In Defense of the Davy Back Fight Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: Article defending the often-maligned Davy Back Fight arc, arguing for its importance in showing crew dynamics and introducing concepts that may be relevant to the final saga.

title: One Piece: Why Long Ring Long Land Arc May Be One Of The Most Important Arcs Yet
author: Game Rant
description: Analysis arguing that the Long Ring Long Land arc could play a major role in the series finale, potentially featuring in a Davy Back Fight between Luffy and Shanks at Laugh Tale.

title: One Piece's Most Hated Story Was Actually Ruined By The Anime
author: Screen Rant
description: Critical analysis of how the anime adaptation extended and potentially weakened the Long Ring Long Land arc compared to the manga, with specific criticism of pacing and character decisions.

author: TV Tropes
description: Detailed recap of the Davy Back Fight arc with TV Tropes-style analysis of recurring themes, character moments, and narrative tropes present in the arc.

title: One Piece Diaries #26: 'Davy Back Fight' Arc
author: Comicon
description: Part of an ongoing 'One Piece Diaries' series where a newcomer chronicles their journey through the series. This entry covers the Davy Back Fight arc.
